class ltbio.clinical.Patient.Patient(code, name: Optional[str] = None, age: Optional[int] = None, sex: Sex = Sex._, conditions: Tuple[MedicalCondition] = (), medications: Tuple[Medication] = (), procedures: Tuple[SurgicalProcedure] = ())#
